node.excerpt: I've tried many approaches when it comes to writing, but one method that I love is coming up with a title first. And titles come out of nowhere. For instance, I held onto the idea of a two-part song with similar messages, but different approachesâ€¦

frontmatter.title: In Case You Ever Listen
frontmatter.description: My mind goes as far as that and it doesn't get back as soon as you do.

node.excerpt: Today is Children's Day in Brazil and once again I'm not home for the occasion. I think it means a lot transition-wise for me, considering the whole symbolism of living alone and away from my family. Anyway, today is not supposed to be a sad momentâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Home, Home
frontmatter.description: I'm already where I wanted to be from the start.

node.excerpt: Do you know the feeling of when you learn a new word and suddenly everybody starts using it? I've wondered in the past about how these things also happen with relationships, like when I didn't know a person before but they appear once and won't stopâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Faith-Seeker
frontmatter.description: Believe me if you can, I know I'm biased.

node.excerpt:
After a long process of overthinking, worrying and postponing, I finally decided to begin this blog.
With an ever-growing interest in music and all processes around it, I was tempted to try my hand at songwriting over two years ago. My previousâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Self-Titled
frontmatter.description: After a long process of overthinking, worrying and postponing, I finally decided to begin this blog.

messages.title: Poems With Choruses
messages.description: Documenting life as I try to fit it in the lyrics of a song.
